attributes.action: Switch off gas & oil supplies from Russia to EU & GB
attributes.additional_details:
To show further and real solidarity with the Ukranian people.
Yes, there will be both negative and positive impacts. Negative-higher prices-which are going up anyway. This,however will be counterbalanced with the warming weather as Spring approaches in the northern hemisphere and on the positive side, it would act as a catalyst for economies in developing greener solutions and so hasten the reduction of harmful emissions.
attributes.background: Sanctions only go so far & impact in medium to long term. There needs to be an immediate and effective measure to cut off the flow of money into Russia.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457

Ban all UK trade with Russia and Belarus until Russian troops leave Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609639

Decisions about trade between the EU and Russia are a matter for the EU, not the UK Government or Parliament.
